attributes.action: Demand full EU accounts for ALL our years of membership prior to any payments.
attributes.background: Demand accounts to allow us to ascertain exactly what monies are owed by and to us and any financial abuses committed by the EU during our entire membership period.

rejection.details:
We are not sure what you are asking the Government to do. The EU already publishes annual accounts. You can find out more here: 

http://ec.europa.eu/budget/explained/reports_control/annual_rep/ann_rep_en.cfm
